verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Free from the law
Oh happy condition
Jesus hath bled
and there is remission
Cursed by the law
And bruised by the fall
Grace hath redeemed us
Once for all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Once for all
Oh sinner recieve it
Once for all
Oh doubter believe it
Cling to the cross
The burden will fall
Christ hath redeemed us
Once for all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There on the Cross
Your burden upbearing
Thorns on His brow
Your Savior is wearing
Never again your sin need appall
You have been pardoned
Once for all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now are we free
There's no condemnation
Jesus provides a perfect salvation
"Come unto Me"
Oh hear His sweet call
Come and He saves us
Once for all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
"Children of God"
Oh glorious calling
Surely His grace
Will keep us from falling
Passing from death t
To life at His call
Blessed salvation
Once for all
